titleInfo.title: Full Gospel Tabernacle in Jesus' Name service, 1998 July 31

mods.abstract: Video recording of a service opening with members in prayer. Billy Taylor opens the service with music. Billy Lemmings, Jamie Coots, Greg Coots, and Linda Coots are all present on stage. Members stand up and some receive an imposition of hands. Members begin to handle serpents after about forty-five minutes of music led variously by Sherman Ward, Billy Lemming and others. When the music ends, members testify and Bruce Helton, Glenn Dukes, Rayford Dunn, Sherman Ward, John Wayne "Punkin" Brown Jr., and Billy Lemming preach. When they have finished, several members of the congregation testify.

name.namePart: Hood, Ralph W. Williamson, W. Paul (William Paul)
